player_news.trend_summary: Robert Lewandowski scored twice as Barcelona dominated Borussia Dortmund 4-0 in the Champions League, putting them on the verge of the semi-finals. His performance etched his name in Champions League history, achieving a yet unspecified record.

player_news.trend_summary: Désiré Doué's stunning, equalizing curler against Aston Villa in the Champions League quarter-final first leg has ignited social media and pundit debates, inspiring PSG to a 3-1 victory alongside goals from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia and Nuno Mendes. His performance is being hailed as a "masterclass" and evidence of a transformed PSG, leaving Aston Villa on the brink in the competition.

player_news.trend_summary: After a three-month absence, Ansu Fati made a rare appearance for Barcelona in their 4-0 Champions League victory against Borussia Dortmund, receiving support from fans. Adding to the intrigue, Lamine Yamal requested to be substituted during the match, reportedly to allow Fati to gain playing time.

player_news.trend_summary: Raphinha is making headlines after a stellar performance in Barcelona's Champions League quarter-final dismantling of Borussia Dortmund, where he combined with Lewandowski and Yamal in a 4-0 victory and matched a Messi record. However, the Brazilian winger also apologized to teammate Cubarsi for a stolen goal in the same match, and earlier this summer, he was reportedly willing to join Arsenal under certain conditions.

player_news.trend_summary: Morgan Rogers believes Aston Villa can still progress in the Champions League despite a 3-1 defeat to PSG, a match where he scored a goal that prompted excitement from Sky Sports pundit Paul Merson. Rogers also reportedly stunned Man City by refusing a return to his former club, citing "struggles."
